articles.author: Nandita Bose, Dmitry Antonov, Olena Harmash
articles.description: U.S. President Donald Trump said he believes his Russian counterpart Vladimir Putin is ready to end his war in Ukraine, speaking on the eve of Friday's summit between the men, but that peace would likely require at least a second meeting involving Ukraine's leader.
articles.title: Trump says Putin ready to make deal on Ukraine, US hopes to include Zelenskiy
